room_title: Escape room "Flight 2157" by Ultimate Escape Game in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Team of 6. It was our first time, we did not escape. The clues were well thought and fun. We will definitely come back for another challenge!

room_title: Escape room "Flight 2157" by Ultimate Escape Game in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Our first escape room experience!This place is amazing, the staff was amazing! We did two rooms and had a lot of fun in both rooms. I would certainly recommend this place to everyone I know!

room_title: Escape room "Flight 2157" by Ultimate Escape Game in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: They've reopened with all new rooms. We've done 2 so far and looking forward to the rest. Good puzzle flow, fun designs. There aren't a lot of great escape rooms in DFW, and Ultimate is now one of the best.
